question: The name of which among the following king of the Hellenistic Seleucid Kingdom has been inscribed on the edicts of Asoka?
explanation:
Ashoka’s Hellenistic contemporaries are
  1. Antiochus II Theos –Syria
  2. Ptolemy II philadelpus –Egypt
  3. Mages –Cyrne
  4. Antigonus Gonatas –Macedonia
  5. Alexander -Epirus
